lines.text: Nice going, Chuckie. Now who's the bigger lame-o? You or me?
Chuckie, tell me it's just a couple of scratches. Tell me my father isn't going to kill me.
The car's totaled, Archie. You're a dead man.
Oh, no...
Hey, cheer up. At least we still got the girls... Girls? Girls?
Excuse me, I'm late for... anything.
I'll pick you up after the party. Let's see, there'll be all that deep preppy conversation, preppy dancing, piles of preppy fun. Party starts at nine, I'll pick you up at nine fifteen.

[about Jay Jay]
I think he's kinda cute.
Who's kinda cute?
You, of course. Especially when you're angry. Your dimple twitches.
Hey, Bandini, what's the matter?
I don't know. My toes are killing me.
Uh, that's because you've got your shoes on the wrong feet.
No, I don't. These are my feet.

[to Otto, about Bandini]
Learn a lesson, Otto. Eat right, get plenty of sleep, and don't drink your chemistry set.
Do you know Beth Franklin?
Yeah. She's goin' out with Beau Middleton. So unless you got twenty-five million dollars and a lifetime supply of Brut, forget about it.
We'll take a nature shot. The ultimate nature shot. I'm talking au naturelle.

Oh no! I'm not taking my clothes off. No way! I once took my clothes off at the drive-in for Eddie Hansen. He went to get popcorn and he never came back. I'm never taking my clothes off again in front of anybody. Not even my husband, unless he's Burt Reynolds. Maybe Richard Gere. Possibly...
Nadine? May I finish what I was trying to say?
Who's stopping you?
What do you think of this? We'll take a picture of Beau Middleton's naked behind and enter that as our nature shot!

[to Peggy]
No! Look, I don't want to go into the fun house. I know we have to get Beau Middleton's picture, but I'm afraid of the dark and whenever I get scared I jump into somebody's arms. If I jump into your arms, people are gonna talk. I can't afford that. As it is my phone's got cobwebs.

[at cheerleading practice]
Cara, a little more energy? You want us to lose to Tech?
Who cares? This is so... high school.
Then why do it?
I happen to look stunning in the uniform!
